The scanner object to get user's input from the command-line interface.

SEND_INTERVAL - Static variable in class kindred.client.network.Client

Server - Class in kindred.server
Implements the main loop of a TCP listening socket Server.
Server() - Constructor for class kindred.server.Server
 
serverIP - Variable in class kindred.client.network.Client
IP of the Server that the Client will connect to.
serverSocket - Variable in class kindred.server.Server
Server's listening TCP socket.
ServerThread - Class in kindred.server
Runs as a Server thread for a connected Client, being responsible for exchanging data with the user.
ServerThread(Socket) - Constructor for class kindred.server.ServerThread
Constructs a ServerThread.
ServerToClientEnum - Enum in kindred.common
Contains an enum number for every type of message the Server can send to the Client.
ServerToClientEnum() - Constructor for enum kindred.common.ServerToClientEnum
 
ServerToClientMessage - Class in kindred.common
Represents a message from the server to a client.

Creates a new ServerToClientMessage of type msg without argument.
ServerToClientMessage(ServerToClientEnum, String) - Constructor for class kindred.common.ServerToClientMessage
Creates a new ServerToClientMessage of type msg with argument argument.

setUnit(Unit) - Method in class kindred.client.model.Tile

socketOut - Variable in class kindred.client.network.Client

start() - Method in class kindred.client.network.Client

surrender() - Method in class kindred.client.model.Game

surrender() - Method in class kindred.client.network.Client
